about_the_game:
Monday Morning Simulator is the much-anticipated sequel to Call Hating, the 2D point-and-click adventure game released in 2023.

In Monday Morning Simulator, you play the part of a worker-from-home who hasn't exactly kept up with modern technology. Your old, outdated, and half-broken home becomes one giant puzzle as you struggle to get your internet working and make it to an important online work meeting.

But fear not, you are accompanied by the benevolent Voice Inside Your Head, or VInYH, who serves as a helpful (and sometimes not-so-helpful) narrator in your quest for bandwidth.

Monday Morning Simulator is stocked with minigames and home maintenance-themed puzzles, including washing dishes, fixing plumbing, troubleshooting errors, remembering passwords and finding the right tools for the job around your home.

Will you overcome these challenges and make it through the automated phone system from hell to get your internet back from A.N.I.T.A. (AllNet InterCorp Technical Assistance) the evil A.I. who is out to thwart you at every turn?!

Coming 2024.
